FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: It looks like I need some money to buy a costume. It would take too long to keep posting selfies.

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: Good thing I know a photographer who LOVES to shoot me.

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: Great! I have enough money to buy the outfit!
